title: AI uncovers two distinct multiple sclerosis types
description: Artificial intelligence (AI), using a simple blood test combined with standard brain images has, for the first time, been able to identify two biologically distinct types of multiple sclerosis (MS), in research led by UCL and Queen Square Analytics, a UCL spinout company.

title: Samsung to double AI mobile devices to 800m units this year
description: Samsung Electronics plans to double this year the number of its mobile devices with “Galaxy AI” features largely powered by Google’s Gemini, its co-CEO said, which would give the US firm an edge over rivals as the global race in artificial intelligence heats up.

title: generated police report states Utah officer was turned into a frog
description: A Utah police department's use of artificial intelligence led to a police report stating that an officer had been transformed into a frog.
content:
Jan. 5 (UPI) -- A Utah police department's use of artificial intelligence led to a police report stating -- falsely -- that an officer had been transformed into a frog.
The Heber City Police Department started using a pair of AI programs, Draft One a... [695 chars]

title: Record copper price signals accelerating race for supplies
description: Copper prices have reached record levels. Fears of shortages and strong demand from artificial intelligence and electric vehicles are driving this surge. Geopolitical events are also raising concerns about the security of critical mineral supplies. Analysts believe prices must rise further to encourage new copper production.
content:

title: AI boom is in early bubble phase, Bridgewater founder Ray Dalio says
description: Jan 5 (Reuters) - The artificial intelligence ‌boom that powered Wall Street's technology stocks is "now in the early ‌stages of a bubble," hedge fund manager Ray Dalio warned in ‌a post on social media platform X on Monday.
